data.name: DreadEye VR Demo
data.detailed_description: Please, take a seat. You'll be here for a while. Don't worry, you won’t be alone. Let these creatures welcome you... They'll keep you company. Give you a taste of a dark surreal experience. Don't be afraid just yet... Perhaps they will spare you this time around. After all... the nastiest thing they can do to you will only be virtual. But... then again... You will probably be wishing you were in a real dream.
data.about_the_game: Please, take a seat. You'll be here for a while. Don't worry, you won’t be alone. Let these creatures welcome you... They'll keep you company. But... then again... You will probably be wishing you were in a real dream.

data.reviews:
“Scariness Level: Scare your friends, laugh at their reactions, perfect for party!”
UploadVR
